data.title: Airlines-SkyTeam Airline Partners
meta_keywords: China Southern Sky Pearl Club ---the frequent flyer program of China Southern
together with our service hotline 95539 and Airport service counters
offer Sky Pearl Club members comprehensive and convenient service throughout China.
data.meta_description: China Southern Sky Pearl Club ,Sky Pearl Club,Frequent Flyer, Mileage Award,Mileage Accrual ,Mileage Redemption,Award Ticket Redemption.
data.text:
At ticketing or airport check-in, please offer your Sky Pearl Club membership card number. Traveling on and after 1 Jan, 2020, Sky Pearl Club members flying with VN/KE/UX/MF/AF/KL/DL/ME/OK/CI/AE/SV/SU/AA/3U flights follow below accrue rules chart:

The accrual flight range of Partner Airlines

(1)Partner Airlinesâ prime flights (flights which coded and operated by the same Partner Airlines)

(2)Code-share flights between China Southern and the Partner Airlines.

Traveling on and after 1 Jan, 2020, code-share flights between any two of the Partner Airlines (including CI/AE/MF) could be accrued. code-share flights between any two of the Partner Airlines (including AF/KL/MF) could be accrued.

(3)Mileage accrual on flights operated by Mandarin Airlines(AE) is limited on the routes between China mainland and China Taiwan.

(4)Charter flights are not eligible for accrual.

(5)Only domestic flights of Si Chuan Airlines are eligible to accrue.

Mileage Creditï¼
